review: So, I should start off by saying I am a Google junkie, its my first go to for any app.That being said, when I initially bought this I loved it. It connected to a lot of the stuff that I would like to see on  a bigger screen I.E. Netflix, Chrome, YouTube etc. Then about 2 weeks after using it I started to notice that it would disconnect out of the blue. I would be watching something on Netflix and open another app at the same time, and Netflix would automatically disconnect from Chromecast. This happens a lot. Also, if I open Netflix and start connecting it to Chromecast and don't let it load all the way before I select a movie to play, it will not load anything and I will have to physically unplug the cable from Chromecast and let it reset. PITA!  Other than those issues (that happens quite frequently) it plays pretty well.Do I regret purchasing this? Kind of. Would I recommend this to friends or family? Absolutely not. I would much rather go explore Roku or Amazon Fire Stick.
author: Donnie

review: This little device is very cool!  I ordered it when it first came out and I have used it off and on since then. I don't use it as much now because I have a Fire stick that offers more functionality.  This device is great though.  I could see taking it with me on trips and using in a hotel room TV because it is that portable.  The downside is it is a client based device.  I have to use something else to control it: My phone, computer, tablet etc... This is where the Fire Stick is more useful with its remote.  Either way I like this gadget and still use it on occasion!
author: A. T.
